A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing. It's a film which is fairly well made\, certainly beautiful to look at\, and with some superb acting. There are some issues with tone\, and has extremely major problems with the plot\, but all that taken into account\, if it was a new IP\, it would be all-in-all... pretty good. However\, this takes place in the 'Star Wars Universe'\, and there are in-universe rules that should be followed... after all this is science fiction\, not a superhero film. And that is where the film falls down. The film straight up craps on all the Star Wars lore and the character's we know and love. It's utterly appalling. The best bit of this film is Mark Hamill's performance\, which was superb\, especially considering he (as I found out later) is also on the record as agreeing with the criticisms the fans are making of the film.
